_comments.stop_on_fail_threshold: Options: 'any_must_have' (stop if any must-have fails), 'all_phases' (stop if any phase fails), 'never' (continue regardless)
_comments.pause_after_phase_X: Set to true to require human approval before proceeding to next phase
_comments.borderline_threshold: Scores between this and strong_pass trigger NEEDS REVIEW
_comments.allow_budget_override: If true, will prompt user to continue when budget exceeded instead of stopping
